EmailTemplate.name: Spec No Match
EmailTemplate.subject: Response Required: LegalZoom Order#
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We have received the specimen and information you submitted for your Trademark filing and have noticed some inconsistent information between the two. Specifically, the logo on your Trademark filing does not exactly match the logo displayed on the specimen you sent to us.
The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) requires that the logo displayed on the specimen be exactly identical to the logo on your Trademark filing.
To resolve this issue, please reply to this email and select ONE of the following options:
1. Submit a new specimen consistent with the logo on your Trademark filing by replying to this e-mail and attaching your file(s) in a .gif, .pdf, .jpeg or .jpg format. Attachments exceeding 6MB should be uploaded here.
2. Instruct us to file your documents with the specimen you have sent us. During examination of your documents, if your USPTO examining attorney raises questions regarding this matter, you will be responsible for responding to the request with the appropriate information.
3. Put your order on hold and consult with an attorney.*
After reviewing this information, please reply to this email and let me know how you would like us to proceed with your order.
If you have any questions or would like additional information, simply reply to this email or call us at (800) 773-0888 Monday–Friday from 6 a.m.–7 p.m. PT.
We appreciate you choosing LegalZoom and look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
* Members of Business Advantage Pro can receive further guidance from an attorney for no additional cost—take advantage of your membership by scheduling a consultation here. If you are not a Business Advantage Pro member and would like more information on this valuable service, please visit here or call customer care at (877) 657-8787. Please note that Business Advantage Pro is not available in all states.
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
